article.title: U.S. Army Procures Position and Azimuth Systems
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Improved Position and Azimuth Determining Systems

article.text: L-3 Communication Corporation, Budd Lake, New Jersey, was awarded a $22,235,189 firm-fixed-price indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of up to 90 Improved Position and Azimuth Determining Systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
